robhu: it seems like if nothing else you should be able to hit the telnet escape sequence and then command telnet to transmit whatever sequences you need.

OK, here you go: http://linux.about.com/od/commands/l/blcmdl1_telnet.htm . The escape sequence should be CTL + ]  , then you can try the various SEND commands listed in the linked page and see if the controller responds.
you probably want to try the send break and send ec commands first.
